duke_standard.text: I think......you'd better...... WATER my horse.
duke_standard.instruct: A deep, gravelly, rhythmic Western drawl. Slow, punctuated delivery with a weary, authoritative grit.
duke_standard.ref_text: Yyou talk too much...THINK too much

duke_chinese.text: 我想……你最好……去给我的马喂点水。
duke_chinese.instruct: A deep, gravelly, and authoritative Western-style voice speaking in Mandarin Chinese.
duke_chinese.ref_text: Yyou talk too much...THINK too much

gettysburg.text: Four score and seven years ago...
gettysburg.instruct: A solemn, rhythmic, and authoritative historical narration.
gettysburg.ref_text: Yyou talk too much...THINK too much
